extension.description: A Kodi addon repository including 4Anime.to, Bild.de and Telewizja Republika
extension.news: 1.0.1 (24-03-2020) - Added the Polish TV addons, namely TVP.pl (by mbebe), WP Pilot and TVP SPORT (by cod34fun). 1.0.2 (24-03-2020) - Added the Italian TV addons, namely Rai Play (by Nightflyer, cttynul, maxbambi, fabpolli) and Mediaset Play (by kodi-bino, cttynul). 1.0.3 (24-03-2020) - Added the YouTube addon (by anxdpanic, bromix). 1.0.4 (06-04-2020) - Added the Amazon VOD addon (by Sandmann79, Varstahl). 1.0.5 (07-04-2020) - Added dependencies for Amazon VOD addon. 1.0.6 (07-04-2020) - Changed version of Kodi-Six (down to 0.0.5) and TVP SPORT (up to 0.0.11). 1.0.7 (07-04-2020) - Added the MediathekView addon (by MediathekView.de, Leo Moll)
